column1: Drank a bowl of soup in Robart Library at noon which caused your stomach discomfort and cost 300 TBucks to see a doctor.
Congratulations on receiving a scholarship of 600 TBucks for your excellent grades!
oops! There is a homeless man who has been following you. You speed up your footsteps forward 5 blocks to get rid of him.
You were playing games last night and missed the important assignment deadline. Move back 3 blocks.
Your best friend plagiarized your CS assignment and you are going to a meeting with your professor in Bahen.
Met a snowstorm and can not leave. Miss a round.
